modName: Taken Veterans - Whirling Dervishes Simmer and Dune
summary:
The Whirling Dervish is a Dual-Scimitar Swinging Master of the Mirage
\"Veterans\" are pre-built, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored yet adapted to your new level.
descriptionHtml:
\"Veterans\" are pre-built characters, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored, and adapted to your new level--allowing you to try out advanced play-styles and quest-lines without the hours of involved preliminaries.

Simmer the Female Whirling Dervish,
or Dune the Male Whirling Dervish

The Whirling Dervish is a dual-scimitar swinging master of the mirage. Top tier Illusion magic keeps the dervish in full control of any encounter, although it can be hard to believe this dangerous flurry of edges and points is at all under control. Sneaky ambushes with devastating dual-weapons and plenty of Stamina for follow up power-attacks makes mincemeat out of all comers. Light Armor and Restoration magic keep the dervish spinning long into the desert nights.

Level 30 Whirling Dervish
29 Unallocated Perk Points
210 Magicka (+50 Highborn Power)
170 Health
210 Stamina

Illusion 100
Light Armor, One-Handed 75
Sneak, Speech, Restoration 50
Conjuration, Archery 20
Heavy Armor, Block, Alchemy, Smithing, Destruction, Pickpocket, Two-Handed, Lockpicking, Enchanting, Alteration  15

1*(100*101/2) + 2*(75*76/2) + 3*(50*51/2)+ 2*(20*21/2) + 10*(15*16/2)
= 16,195 [url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Total Experience Spent In Skills[/url]

Spells:
	Muffle, Frenzy, Rally, Invisibility, Pacify, Rout, Hysteria, Call to Arms, Harmony, Mayhem
	Bound Sword, Conjure Flame Atronach, Bound Bow
	Steadfast Ward, Close Wounds, Heal Other, Repel Lesser Undead, Turn Undead, Grand Healing

Shouts:
	Disarm	(Zun Haal Viik)
	Slow Time (Tiid Klo Ul)
	
Powers:
	Highborn (+50 Magicka & Daily Fast Regen)
	Prowler\'s Profit (Find more jewels)

Gear:	
	Glass Helmet of Eminent Restoration	000d53d7
	Glass Armor of Eminent Illusion	0010cfa3
	Glass Gauntlets of Major Wielding	000d53af
	Glass Boots of Major Stamina	0010df89	

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation and Use:
Unzip the saved game in the download to your .../My Games/Skyrim/Saves folder, then load it in Skyrim.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
1.0 Lookin\' good.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Whenever a character earns a rank, r, in a skill they gain r experience. So when a character has 0 in all skills they have zero experience, and when they have 100 in all skills, at level 81.5, they have 90,900 experience. A level 30 character should have about 15,865 total experience summed from their skills.

Taken Veterans should look good with any texture or mesh mods you may use, if any. The mods used in the screenshots include:
Face Textures (Female): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url]
Face Textures (Male): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26]Detailed Faces[/url]

Look in the discussions area for the batch commands allowing you to make a veteran out of a character you\'ve created yourself!

More Info:
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Experience Table[/url]
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimCharBatch]Tips on making your own veterans[/url]

Drop a Taken Veteran save game in your Saves folder and load it up. See what you think!
author: Taken
